ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Solar Wind and Suprathermal Ion Composition Studies (SWICS)
ResourceHeader.Description: The Solar Wind Ion Composition Spectrometer (SWICS) determines mass, charge, and energy for ions in the energy range of 0.5 to 30 keV/e. The SWICS "stop" MCP experienced a failure resulting in reduced capabilities for this instrument.

InformationURL.Name: Wind spacecraft SMS Documentation
InformationURL.Description: Information related to the SMS instrument suite at the Wind spacecraft website.

Instrument.InvestigationName: Solar Wind and Suprathermal Ion Composition Studies (SWICS)
